questions-and-answers.a: Shelter is a platform that provides property finding and posting services, powered by a chatbot to assist with your queries.

questions-and-answers.q: How do I register on Shelter?
questions-and-answers.a: To register, click on the 'Sign Up' button on our website and fill out the registration form with your detls.

questions-and-answers.q: What types of properties are listed on Shelter?
questions-and-answers.a: We have a wide range of properties, including apartments, houses, villas, and commercial spaces for rent and sale.

questions-and-answers.q: Can I post my property on Shelter?
questions-and-answers.a: Yes, you can post your property on our platform by creating a listing and adding detls like photos, description, and pricing.

questions-and-answers.q: How do I contact a property owner or agent?
questions-and-answers.a: You can contact them directly through our chatbot or by sending a message through the 'Contact' button on the property listing page.

questions-and-answers.q: Is my personal information safe on Shelter?
questions-and-answers.a: Yes, we take data privacy seriously and have implemented measures to ensure your personal information is protected.

questions-and-answers.q: Can I search for properties based on my preferences?
questions-and-answers.a: Yes, our chatbot allows you to search for properties based on your preferences like location, budget, and amenities.

questions-and-answers.q: How do I know if a property is avlable?
questions-and-answers.a: Our chatbot updates property avlability in real-time, so you can check the status of a property instantly.

questions-and-answers.q: Can I schedule a property visit through Shelter?
questions-and-answers.a: Yes, you can schedule a property visit by contacting the owner or agent through our chatbot.

questions-and-answers.q: Are there any fees for using Shelter?
questions-and-answers.a: We offer both free and pd services. You can contact us to learn more about our pricing plans.

questions-and-answers.q: How do I report a fraudulent property listing?
questions-and-answers.a: If you suspect a fraudulent listing, please report it to us immediately through our 'Report Abuse' button.

questions-and-answers.q: Can I save my favorite properties?
questions-and-answers.a: Yes, you can bookmark your favorite properties and access them later through your account.

questions-and-answers.q: How do I contact Shelter customer support?
questions-and-answers.a: You can reach us through our website, eml, or by chatting with our support team.

questions-and-answers.q: Is Shelter avlable on mobile devices?
questions-and-answers.a: Yes, our platform is optimized for mobile devices, and you can access it through our mobile app or website.

questions-and-answers.q: Can I cancel or edit my property listing?
questions-and-answers.a: Yes, you can manage your property listings through your account dashboard.
